value: The program filmed the other day was finally aired.
The positive responses were great in number as well… I’m relieved.
Now that I look back on it､ this project began from when I visited that entertainer’s party…
I was able to have this job because of meeting people for the first time and accepting an invitation.
And now that I think about it､ my leap into the entertainment industry was something guided by more connections.
Meeting you､ Producer､ as well as my strange connection with Hanamura-san and Nekoyanagi-san…
Because I’ve become able to treasure these one-in-a-lifetime encounters､
I was able to proceed down the path of idols with yet another step.
I must continue to treasure the connections I’ve been blessed with having…
So please… Continue to take care of me from now on､ Producer.
